column6: CloudFlare provides solutions that protect and accelerate websites online. It offers the CloudFlare content delivery network, CloudFlare optimiser and CloudFlare security, as well as security protection services; and detects new attacks that arise against websites on its network. CloudFlare was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California, US.

Bushveld Minerals is a South Africa-based integrated vanadium producer, supplying about 3.5% of the global vanadium. Bushveld Minerals is also developing and promoting the vanadium in the growing global energy storage market. The company also operates Bushveld Energy, an energy storage project developer and component manufacturer and Lemur Holdings, an integrated thermal coal mining and independent power producer (IPP) project in Madagascar.
Kuoni is a tourist travel company. Kuoni was founded in 1906 and is currently headquartered in Zurich, Switzerland.
column36: Mr. Jiten Vyas, chief operating officer, VFS Global, said; "This newly launched centre will effectively cater to meeting the growing demand for travel between residents of Madagascar and China"
